snippet: The Middle States Commission on Higher Education gave the university until Sept. 30 to disclose its plans to correct conditions that contributed to a sexual abuse scandal.
abstract: Middle States Commission on Higher Education warns Pennsylvania State University its accreditation is in jeopardy unless it corrects conditions that contributed to sexual abuse of children by former assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky.
lead_paragraph: The Middle States Commission on Higher Education gave the university until Sept. 30 to disclose its plans to correct conditions that contributed to a sexual abuse scandal.

headline.seo: Penn State Warned by Accreditation Panel
headline.main: Penn State Warned by Accreditation Panel
